snippet: After more than a decade of work, scientists have deciphered about 3,500 words of explanatory text written on the Antikythera Mechanism, found in a shipwreck.
abstract: Researchers studying Antikythera Mechanism, 2,100-year-old device discovered in ancient shipwreck, decipher portion of text inscribed on instrument and determine it functioned as guide to astronomy.
lead_paragraph: After more than a decade of work, scientists have deciphered about 3,500 words of explanatory text written on the Antikythera Mechanism, found in a shipwreck.

headline.print_headline: Early Adopters: The Ancient Greek Philosopher’s Guide to the Galaxy
headline.main: The Ancient Greek Philosopher’s Guide to the Galaxy
